Article Title: Viral video: 14-year-old Vaibhav Suryavanshi in tears after debut IPL dismissal
Article Text:
Vaibhav Suryavanshi (BCCI Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

NEW DELHI: In a moment that captured hearts across the cricketing world, 14-year-old Vaibhav Suryavanshi ’s dream IPL debut ended in tears -- literally.The Rajasthan Royals ’ prodigy, playing his first-ever IPL match at just 14 years and 28 days old, lit up the Jaipur evening with an audacious 34 off 20 balls before being stumped by Rishabh Pant off Aiden Markram’s crafty off-spin.Opening alongside the ever-aggressive Yashasvi Jaiswal , Vaibhav wasted no time announcing himself.A clean six off Shardul Thakur set the tone, followed by a breathtaking first-ball six off Avesh Khan in the next over, placing him on a rare list of players to hit a six on their first IPL delivery.The young left-hander showed both flair and nerves of steel, taking on international-quality bowlers with ease, and sharing a brisk opening stand with Jaiswal.But as cricket has it, glory and heartbreak often walk hand in hand. In the 9th over, trying to dance down the track and work the ball into the leg side, Vaibhav lost his balance and Pant, ever alert, whipped the bails off in a flash.The TV replay confirmed the inevitable: his back foot was in the air.What followed was a gut-wrenching scene: the teenager couldn’t hold back his emotions as he walked off the field, wiping away tears.Watch:Vaibhav Suryavanshi may have exited with tears, but he left the field having etched his name in IPL folklore.For Rajasthan Royals and Indian cricket fans, this isn’t just a debut. It appears to be the beginning of something extraordinary.
Article Summary: 14-year-old vaibhav suryavanshi's dream ipl debut ended in tears -- literally. The rajasthan royals prodigy lit up the jaipur evening with an audacious 34 off 20 balls. But as cricket has it, glory and heartbreak often walk hand in hand.

Article Title: Tom Brady hints at betrayal and ‘willful blindness’ as Gisele Bündchen gets closer to her new baby daddy
Article Text:
Tom Brady has revealed glimpses of his personal struggles, particularly in the wake of his divorce from supermodel Gisele Bündchen (Image via Getty Images)

From gridiron greatness to emotional vulnerability



When public image collides with private battles



Even the most successful athletes face challenges that stats and accolades can’t capture—and Tom Brady is no exception. Widely regarded as the greatest quarterback in NFL history , Brady's legendary career boasts an unmatched seven Super Bowl titles, yet behind the shine of championship rings lies a more vulnerable, human side he’s beginning to share with the world.For two decades, Tom Brady maintained a laser focus on football, becoming the ultimate symbol of discipline and competitive excellence. But recently, the 46-year-old has revealed glimpses of his personal struggles, particularly in the wake of his divorce from supermodel Gisele Bündchen . Brady, who is usually tight-lipped about his private life, opened up about the emotional toll of navigating heartbreak, admitting he’s dealt with moments of “willful blindness.”This phrase—suggesting a conscious decision to ignore uncomfortable truths—points to the complexities Brady faced in his marriage’s unraveling. While he didn’t name names, the context was unmistakable, especially given recent headlines surrounding Bündchen's ongoing relationship with her jiu-jitsu trainer, who is now widely rumored to be her partner and the father figure in her children’s lives.“Willful blindness” is not just a phrase—it’s a powerful acknowledgment of emotional compromise. Brady’s reflection reveals the cost of chasing perfection on the field while personal issues simmer in the background. The quarterback, once seemingly invincible both in his career and family life, now speaks like someone reckoning with the pain of being left behind. For fans, it’s a rare and raw admission: the GOAT is still just a man.The emotional fallout of watching Gisele Bündchen move on publicly is undoubtedly difficult for someone so accustomed to control and success. Reports of her being seen with her new partner and children add emotional weight to Brady’s recent comments, suggesting a sense of betrayal or at least loss.Also Read: Fresh discussion on Tom Brady and Gisele’s Bündchen’s marriage reignites debate over missed red flags Tom Brady’s recent openness signals a shift—not just for him but for the culture surrounding sports icons. His words serve as a reminder that personal pain doesn't discriminate by fame or fortune.As Tom Brady transitions into the next chapter of his life, his legacy will now also include emotional authenticity—proof that true greatness isn't only measured by rings, but by the willingness to confront what hurts behind closed doors.
Article Summary: Tom brady has revealed glimpses of his personal struggles, particularly in the wake of his divorce from supermodel gisele bündchen. Brady, who is usually tight-lipped about his private life, opened up about the emotional toll of navigating heartbreak. His words serve as a reminder that personal pain doesn't discriminate by fame or fortune.

Article Title: NBA Trade Rumors: Golden State Warriors could bag $166 million Miami Heat superstar to form Big 3 with Stephen Curry and Jimmy Butler
Article Text:
Golden State Warriors guard Stephen Curry (30) is congratulated by forward Draymond Green after making a 3-point basket during the second half of an NBA play-in tournament basketball game against the Memphis Grizzlies in San Francisco, Tuesday, April 15, 2025. (Image via AP Photo/Jeff Chiu)

Golden State Warriors

Bam Adebayo

(Disclaimer: The data and analysis in this post are based on conjecture as of right now. Although the information is based on reliable sources, it's crucial to remember that these are not official declarations or verified actions. It is advised that readers use caution when interpreting this analysis and wait for official updates as the offseason progresses.)

Why the Golden State Warriors Need to Move On from Buddy Hield

Bam Adebayo (Image via USA TODAY Sports)

"He’s looked more like a fraudulent splash brother as time has progressed."

Buddy Hield’s Decline in Key Stats

Bam Adebayo: The Ideal Frontcourt Upgrade

How Adebayo Fits with the Golden State Warriors

Thenarrowly escaped a Play-In disaster against the Memphis Grizzlies , securing the No. 7 seed in the Western Conference. But even with their postseason spot locked in, changes may be necessary this offseason—starting with moving on from Buddy Hield and pursuing Miami Heat star, as predicted by Caleb Hightower of Sporting News Buddy Hield’s early-season promise as a Klay Thompson replacement has faded. His three-point shooting, once reliable, has plummeted to concerning lows:- December: 30.5% from three- January: 31.5% from three- Play-In performance: 1-of-4 from deep against MemphisWhile Hield finished the regular season at 37.0% from beyond the arc, his inconsistency makes him a liability. As Caleb Hightower noted,If the Golden State Warriors exit the playoffs early, targeting Bam Adebayo in a trade could reshape their roster. The three-time All-Star has evolved into a complete two-way force:- 2024-25 Stats: 18.1 PPG, 9.6 RPG, 4.3 APG- Shooting Splits: 48.5% FG, 35.7% 3P- Versatility: Scores inside, handles the ball, and stretches the floorAdebayo’s growth from a defensive specialist to an offensive weapon addresses Golden State’s need for a dynamic big man.1. Scoring Boost: Provides interior scoring and mid-range efficiency.2. Playmaking: Adds a facilitator from the high post.3. Defensive Anchor: Complements Draymond Green’s versatility.The Trade ScenarioA Hield-Adebayo swap wouldn’t improve the Warriors’ outside shooting, but it would give them a proven All-Star to pair with Stephen Curry and Draymond Green. Miami, meanwhile, could benefit from Hield’s shooting if they retool their roster.Potential Trade Package- Warriors Receive: Bam Adebayo- Heat Receive: Buddy Hield, future draft picks, and/or young playersAlso read: NBA Offseason Rumors: Los Angeles predicted to acquire 6-foot-8 Brooklyn Nets forward to form Big 3 with LeBron James and Luka Doncic Although Golden State's urgency will depend on their postseason run, switching from Hield to Adebayo makes sense. Bam Adebayo's versatile style of play may be the key to the Golden State Warriors' next championship run, as Hightower's analysis indicates.
Article Summary: Bam adebayo could be the key to the golden state warriors' next championship run. Buddy hield’s early-season promise as a klay thompson replacement has faded. Miami heat could benefit from hield's shooting if they retool their roster. The three-time all-star has evolved into a complete two-way force.

Article Title: Stephen Curry and wife Ayesha steal the spotlight at Sinners premiere while LeBron and Savannah James keep it casual at private screening - See Pic
Article Text:
Image credit: Instagram/X

Key Highlights

Stephen Curry and wife Ayesha were present for the Sinners premiere

and wife Ayesha were present for the LeBron James and wife Savannah James hosted a private screening of the film

and wife hosted a private screening of the film Sinners is directed by Ryan Coogler and stars Michael B. Jordan

Stephen Curry and Ayesha attend Sinners premiere

LeBron James and Savannah host Sinners screening

A bunch of NBA players and their wives came together to support Michael B. Jordan's new Hollywood movie, Sinners. While Los Angeles Lakers power forward LeBron James and wife Savannah James hosted a private screening of the film at their home, Golden State Warriors point guard Stephen Curry and his wife Ayesha attended the Sinners premiere on Thursday. Sinners is directed by filmmaker Ryan Coogler and released in the US last Friday.Directed by Ryan Coogler, Sinners stars Michael B. Jordan of Black Panther fame in the lead role. The film also features Hailee Steinfeld, Miles Caton, Jack O'Connell, and others. It was released in the U.S. on April 18.At the premiere, Stephen looked dapper in a casual gray suit, while Ayesha stunned in a little black dress paired with a jacket. As a picture of the couple from the premiere was shared online, fans couldn’t stop praising Ayesha for her look. One fan reacted on X, “Ayesha looks beautiful. Steph is dapper… but I need him to stay home and rest lol. He is so active. I need him to be a couch potato and conserve all his energy for these playoffs.” Another tweeted, “Can we have a moment to appreciate how absolutely stunning Ayesha is? She is glowing. Absolutely beautiful.” The picture was originally shared by J oslyn Ros e.Meanwhile, LeBron James and Savannah hosted a private screening of Sinners. They dressed casually for the gathering, with James in a sky-blue sweatshirt and pajama pants, and Savannah in a hoodie and pants. Sharing two pictures on X, James wrote, “My brothers Ryan Coogler and Michael B. Jordan did it again!!! ABSOLUTELY INCREDIBLE FILM! Ryan, thank you for allowing my Queen, me, family, and friends to screen it. 10/10 movie! Make sure y’all go check out Sinners tomorrow! It’s a MUST SEE!!!!!!”A fan reacted to his post, “Nice to see him doing normal things like movie date nights.” Another tweeted, “Now let's win a championship. Let's go Lakers. #LakeShow.”Also Read: NBA Offseason Rumors: Los Angeles Lakers might sign 10x All-Star to support Luka Doncic and LeBron James in championship push The Los Angeles Lakers are set to face the Minnesota Timberwolves in the first round of the playoffs starting Saturday. The Golden State Warriors will play against the Houston Rockets on Sunday.
Article Summary: Stephen curry and wife ayesha attended the sinners premiere on thursday. Lebron james and wife savannah james hosted a private screening of the film. Sinners is directed by ryan coogler and stars michael b. jordan of black panther fame. It was released in the us on april 18.

Article Title: WWE WrestleMania 41 Night 1 Results & Highlights (4/19/25): Paul Heyman sides with Seth Rollins, new champions crowned, and more
Article Text:
Image via WWE

Jey Uso vs Gunther

Poll Did you enjoy the outcome of the main event match? No Yes

The New Day vs The War Raiders

Jade Cargill vs Naomi

LA Knight vs Jacob Fatu

El Grande Americano vs Rey Fenix

Tiffany Stratton vs Charlotte Flair

Roman Reigns vs CM Punk vs Seth Rollins

The first night of WrestleMania 41 was a night filled with top-class in-ring action, spectacular moments and a shocking end.WrestleMania 41 kicked off its first night in the Allegiant Stadium in Las Vegas. The night saw new champions being crowned on the big stage, fast-paced in-ring showdowns, and memorable moments created. Moreover, the main event of WrestleMania 41 Night 1 saw a compelling showdown and ended with a shocker as Paul Heyman switched sides and joined with The Visionary, Seth Rollins This was the opening match between Jey Uso and Gunther for the World Heavyweight Championship. The bout saw Gunther dominate Jey Uso for the majority of the match, but the YEET man refused to back down. As the match approached its end, Uso connected with a handful of superkicks and splashes. He then nailed Gunther with a spear and, in a shocking turn, locked in the sleeper hold to make him tap out to become the new World Heavyweight Champion.The match was contested with WWE World Tag Team Championships on the line. Both teams went up against each other in an evenly matched showdown and classic display of tag team wrestling. However, in the end, The New Day's mean streak was able to capitalize on Erik and Ivar as they defeated them to become tag team champions for the 12th time in their career.The two heated rivals went back and forth against each other. Naomi's aggression caused her to inflict major damage on Jade Cargill. However, the Storm did not stay down and came back with the same fury. As the match came down to the final moments, Cargill delivered a combination of a Jackhammer and Jaded to pin Naomi for the win.This match was contested for the WWE United States Championship. Both men fought tooth and nail against each other with multiple near-falls and displaying some exciting in-ring moves. In the end, LA Knight connected with a BFT, but Jacob kicked out. He then took control and delivered a pair of moonsaults on the megastar to win the match and become the new WWE United States Champion.The match was originally supposed to feature El Grande Americano against Rey Mysterio, but he was replaced by Rey Fenix due to injury. The duo displayed an excellent match with their respective lucha styles. As the match came down to its final moments, El Grande once again had an object in his mask, and Rey Fenix hit his face as he was going for the Go to Amigo, injuring his leg. This gave El Grande the upper hand, and he hit the diving headbutt with the object still in his mask and picked up the win in his WrestleMania debut.This match was contested for the WWE Women's Championship. The match marked the debut of Tiffany Stratton at WrestleMania as she defended her title against her idol, Charlotte Flair, after weeks of a heated feud. Both women delivered one of the best matches of the night as they displayed some power-packed moves, leading to a thrilling encounter. As the dust settled, Tiffany Stratton delivered a powerslam and the Prettiest Moonsault Ever to retain her title.This was the main event match of WrestleMania 41 Night 1. It was a blockbuster showdown as three of the biggest names in the professional wrestling industry tore down the house at the Allegiant Stadium in Las Vegas. Reigns, Punk, and Rollins delivered one of the captivating bouts in WrestleMania history, which went all over the ringside. The match saw all three men hitting their best moves, and multiple nearfalls as Paul Heyman watched on from ringside. As the match came to its end, Paul Heyman brought a chair and handed to CM Punk. He then low blowed him and gave the chair to Roman Reigns. As Reigns proceeded to attack Rollins, Heyman betrayed him as well and handed the chair to Rollins who took down Reigns to win the main event and joined forces with The Wiseman.Also read: WWE WrestleMania 41 results: Main Event Jey Uso wins the World title match, YEET!
Article Summary: Wrestlemania 41 kicked off its first night in the allegiant stadium in las vegas. The night saw new champions being crowned on the big stage, fast-paced in-ring showdowns, and memorable moments created. The main event of wrestlemania 41 night 1 saw a compelling showdown and ended with a shocker as paul heyman switched sides.

Article Title: IPL match today, PBKS vs RCB: Team prediction, head-to-head, Mullanpur Stadium pitch report, Chandigarh weather update
Article Text:
RCB vs PBKS (PTI Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Poll Will Nehal Wadhera secure a regular spot in the PBKS middle order after his last performance? No, he needs more time Yes, definitely

Bombay Sport Exchange Episode 3: Kane Williamson exclusive on NextGen cricketers to watch out for

PBKS vs RCB Weather Forecast for Chandigarh

PBKS vs RCB, IPL 2025 Livestream and Broadcast

PBKS vs RCB Squads

RCB squad:

PBKS squad:

NEW DELHI: Punjab Kings (PBKS) return home brimming with confidence after clinically dismantling Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) in a rain-shortened clash at the Chinnaswamy just two days ago. But as both sides gear up for the rematch in Match No. 37 of IPL 2025 at the Maharaja Yadavindra Singh International Cricket Stadium in New Chandigarh, the stakes are significantly higher.With five wins in eight matches, PBKS are sitting pretty in second place. Another win here would further solidify their playoff push. RCB, on the other hand, despite a strong start to the season, now find themselves slipping to fourth after back-to-back losses. They'll be desperate to stop the slide and regain momentum on what promises to be a spin-friendly track in Chandigarh.In Saturday’s 14-over rain-affected clash, PBKS executed their plans to perfection. Their bowlers, led by Marco Jansen (2/10), Yuzvendra Chahal, and Harpreet Brar, skittled RCB for just 95. Arshdeep Singh’s early double strike -- including the prized wicket of Virat Kohli -- set the tone.While RCB showed brief resistance through Tim David’s unbeaten 50, it wasn’t enough to mask a middle-order collapse. Punjab chased down the target with 11 balls to spare, thanks to a calm, match-winning knock from Nehal Wadhera, who remained unbeaten on 33 off 19.Wadhera, still new to IPL stardom, is now pushing for a regular middle-order spot -- especially with Shashank Singh and Josh Inglis yet to find form.RCB will want to brush off that defeat quickly, knowing they simply didn’t show up with the bat. Josh Hazlewood (3/14) and Bhuvneshwar Kumar (2/26) were bright spots with the ball, but RCB's batting fragility -- especially in the Powerplay -- has become a pattern.Phil Salt’s explosive starts haven’t lasted, while Kohli’s dismissal for just 1 in the last outing raised eyebrows. Captain Rajat Patidar is yet to truly stamp his authority, despite crossing 1000 IPL runs last game. They’ll hope Tim David can carry his late-innings form into a more prominent role.The big question for RCB is whether they stick with the same XI or ring in changes -- especially in spin, where PBKS clearly held the edge.The pitch in New Chandigarh is expected to play slow and low, especially in the second innings. Spinners have traditionally found grip here, making Harpreet Brar and Chahal crucial for Punjab. RCB, meanwhile, will likely rely on Suyash Sharma and Krunal Pandya to counter.If dew stays away in the evening, expect the toss to play a big role -- with both captains eyeing a chance to bowl first and exploit the early tackiness.The Maharaja Yadavindra Singh Stadium has favored spinners and slower bowlers this season. The dry surface tends to hold up, especially in the evening games, and scoring in the second innings hasn’t been easy. Anything above 160 could be competitive.Priyansh Arya, Prabhsimran Singh, Shreyas Iyer (c), Nehal Wadhera, Josh Inglis (wk), Marcus Stoinis, Shashank Singh, Marco Jansen, Harpreet Brar, Yuzvendra Chahal, Arshdeep SinghXavier BartlettPhil Salt, Virat Kohli, Devdutt Padikkal, Rajat Patidar (c), Liam Livingstone, Jitesh Sharma (wk), Tim David, Krunal Pandya, Bhuvneshwar Kumar, Josh Hazlewood, Yash DayalSuyash SharmaA warm and dry evening is expected with temperatures hovering around 34°C at match time. Humidity could rise slightly, but there’s no rain on the radar. Conditions should remain stable for the full 40 overs.Catch the match live on Star Sports Network on TV, with live streaming on JioHotstar from 3:30 PM IST.Philip Salt, Virat Kohli, Devdutt Padikkal, Rajat Patidar (c), Liam Livingstone, Jitesh Sharma (w), Krunal Pandya, Tim David, Bhuvneshwar Kumar, Josh Hazlewood, Yash Dayal, Rasikh Dar Salam, Suyash Sharma, Manoj Bhandage, Jacob Bethell, Swapnil Singh, Abhinandan Singh, Romario Shepherd, Lungi Ngidi, Nuwan Thushara, Mohit Rathee, Swastik ChikaraPriyansh Arya, Prabhsimran Singh (w), Shreyas Iyer (c), Marcus Stoinis, Nehal Wadhera, Glenn Maxwell, Shashank Singh, Marco Jansen, Arshdeep Singh, Lockie Ferguson, Yuzvendra Chahal, Yash Thakur, Suryansh Shedge, Praveen Dubey, Azmatullah Omarzai, Vijaykumar Vyshak, Josh Inglis, Xavier Bartlett, Vishnu Vinod, Aaron Hardie, Kuldeep Sen, Harpreet Brar, Harnoor Singh, Musheer Khan, Pyla Avinash
Article Summary: Punjab kings (pbks) return home brimming with confidence after clinically dismantling royal challengers bengaluru (rcb) in a rain-shortened clash at the chinnaswamy just two days ago. Rcb, despite a strong start to the season, now find themselves slipping to fourth after back-to-back losses.

Article Title: Sonya Curry showers praise for Stephen Curry’s brother Seth Curry after his latest accolade: “I’m so proud of you”
Article Text:
Curry led the NBA with a career-best 45.6% from deep, becoming the second Hornets player to do so.

Sonya and Stephen Curry praised Seth for his resilience, while Coach Charles Lee applauded his leadership and work ethic.

praised Seth for his resilience, while Coach applauded his leadership and work ethic. Seth credited constant communication with coaches and his adaptability for helping him stay sharp all season.

Sonya Curry reacted to Seth Curry’s 3-Point percentage crown



Sonya Curry is a proud mother of two NBA stars— Stephen and Seth Curry. While Stephen Curry has made his name in the history of the league as one of the elite superstars, Seth Curry has also made waves in the scene playing for the Charlotte Hornets . Recently, Seth Curry has officially clinched the NBA’s three-point percentage title, capping off a season-long pursuit with the league’s most accurate shooting from beyond the arc. Sonya responded to her son’s latest accolade with a heartfelt note.As Seth Curry has secured the NBA’s three-point percentage crown, finishing the season as the league’s most efficient shooter from deep, his mother, Sonya Curry, reacted with a heartfelt gesture. “I’m so proud of you @sdotcurry ! You continue to excel and leave your mark on the NBA in your own way and in your own time! You have forged an impressive career through resilience and hard work! I love you!!!” Sonya wrote on Instagram.Seth Curry keeps showing steady improvement year after year. This time, he’s earned his first career NBA 3-point percentage title, becoming just the second player in Hornets history, alongside Glen Rice, to achieve the honor.His brother and the Golden State Warriors veteran, Stephen Curry also shared a congratulatory message. “Congratulations on leading the NBA this season in three-point percentage. Obviously, doing right by the Curry name.”Former NBA star and Seth's father Dell Curry was not keeping his thoughts on his son's achievements to himself. "Seth Curry, aka SDot. Well, what can I say other than I'm proud of you. Your're my son my golfing buddy, but most importently, my friend. So, congratulations Number 30," he said.“Obviously, it’s not something I think about coming into the year or even throughout the year,” Seth said. “I’ve been in the top five a lot of times in my career, but I’ve never finished the year No. 1. It’s a testament to consistent work ethic and being ready. It’s a great accomplishment, something me and my dad have now, and Steph does not have. Yeah, it means a little bit something,” he continued.This season, Seth hit a career-high 45.6% from beyond the arc, knocking down 83 of his 182 attempts.“I think I check my numbers maybe two or three times a year. I’m just going out there, playing the right way, trying to lead this group on and off the floor. If I’m open, be aggressive, make plays, knock down shots. If I’m not, swing it to the open guy. For me, it’s just going out there, playing simple basketball, making my open shots, creating for my teammates and creating space when I can, make it easier on them. Just try to give confidence to the group.”Reflecting on his journey through a challenging season, Seth shared how constant communication with the coaching staff kept him mentally locked in. “The constant communication with coach was good,” he said, explaining how he stayed prepared despite fluctuating minutes. “My adaptability and being able to come in with a rhythm… that’s important,” Curry noted. “Come in, make shots right away – that’s important,” he added.Also Read: “Basketball Gods smiled down” – Magic Johnson sends clear message about NBA playoff matchups for fans Hornets Head Coach Charles Lee also reacted to Seth’s latest milestone. “Very excited for Seth,” Lee said adding, “It’s cool for our organization, but even cooler for him. To achieve that after all the work he’s put in throughout his whole career, I’m very happy for him. I’m grateful for everything he’s given to our team as that veteran leader, but also kudos to our whole organization for investing in player development.”
Article Summary: Curry led the nba with a career-best 45.6% from deep, becoming the second hornets player to do so. Sonya and stephen curry praised seth for his resilience, while coach charles lee applauded his leadership and work ethic. Seth credited constant communication with coaches and his adaptability for helping him stay sharp all season.

Article Title: Who won yesterday's IPL match GT vs DC, RR vs LSG: Yesterday IPL match result
Article Text:
LSG vs RR (PTI Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Bombay Sport Exchange Episode 3: Kane Williamson exclusive on NextGen cricketers to watch out for

NEW DELHI: Saturday's IPL 2025 double-header served up two nail-biters, with Jos Buttler and Avesh Khan playing lead roles in contrasting fashion to guide Gujarat Titans and Lucknow Super Giants to memorable wins over Delhi Capitals and Rajasthan Royals, respectively.In Ahmedabad, Buttler weathered cramps and unleashed a blistering unbeaten 97 off 54 balls to steer Gujarat Titans to a seven-wicket victory over Delhi Capitals.Chasing 204, GT overcame early hiccups with Shubman Gill and B Sai Sudharsan departing early, but Buttler anchored the chase alongside Sherfane Rutherford (43), the pair adding a match-turning 119-run stand for the third wicket.Buttler’s knock was a masterclass in timing and power; he famously took apart Mitchell Starc for five consecutive boundaries in the 15th over, blending classical strokeplay with brute efficiency.Despite missing out on a hundred, Buttler ensured the chase ended with four balls to spare as Rahul Tewatia finished things in style.Earlier, Prasidh Krishna’s 4/41 helped restrict DC to 203/8 despite fighting knocks from Axar Patel (39) and Ashutosh Sharma (37 off 19).In Jaipur, Avesh Khan delivered under extreme pressure, defending nine runs in the final over as Lucknow Super Giants eked out a two-run win against Rajasthan Royals.RR, chasing 181, were coasting at 156/2 in 17 overs with a blazing Yashasvi Jaiswal (74) and 14-year-old debutant Vaibhav Suryavanshi (34) setting the tone.But Avesh’s deadly 18th over, removing Jaiswal and Riyan Parag, turned the game on its head.With nine needed off the final six, Avesh dismissed Shimron Hetmyer and conceded just six runs, finishing with 3/37 and sealing a heist win for LSG.Earlier, Aiden Markram (66) and Ayush Badoni (50) helped LSG post a competitive 180/5, with Abdul Samad’s 10-ball 30 lifting them past 175.The wins saw Gujarat Titans climb to the top of the table, while Lucknow Super Giants revived their campaign with a gritty, last-over triumph that will be talked about for days.
Article Summary: Gujarat titans beat delhi capitals by seven wickets in ipl 2025. Lucknow super giants beat rajasthan royals by two runs in jaipur. Jos buttler and avesh khan played lead roles in contrasting fashion.

Article Title: Rangers fire Head Coach Peter Laviolette after disastrous season — But is he really to blame?
Article Text:
New York Rangers fire Head Coach Laviolette after collapse, front office under scrutiny (Image via: Getty Images)

Key Highlights:

Laviolette fired after playoff miss



fired after playoff miss Rangers suffer historic post-trophy collapse

suffer historic post-trophy collapse Drury's leadership faces growing criticism

Is Laviolette the fall guy for front office failures?



New York Rangers fire head coach Peter Laviolette | Instant Reaction

Rangers fire Head Coach, but front office missteps fuel deeper crisis



In a move that’s more scapegoat than solution, the New York Rangers fired head coach Peter Laviolette on Saturday and with it, tried to wash their hands of one of the most embarrassing collapses in recent franchise history. After a record-setting 2022-23 season, the Rangers didn’t just miss the playoffs in 2024, they imploded. And rather than admit the problem runs deeper than the bench, GM Chris Drury seems content pinning it all on the coaching staff.Let’s call it what it is: the Rangers' issues didn’t start or end with Peter Laviolette. Yes, the team underperformed. Yes, their power play was abysmal. But to act like the man behind the bench is the root of the problem is a convenient narrative that protects the real culprits, the ones in suits, not skates.Drury’s roster decisions were puzzling all season long. Trading captain Jacob Trouba mid-season raised eyebrows. Shipping off Kaapo Kakko and Filip Chytil while shuffling in new faces like J.T. Miller and Carson Soucy only added to the instability. And let’s not forget the March deadline moves that felt more like desperation than direction. The chemistry never clicked because the pieces kept changing and that’s not on Laviolette.Worse yet, the Rangers are now part of a not-so-proud club, one of only four teams in NHL history to win the Presidents’ Trophy and miss the playoffs the very next season. That’s not just a stumble. That’s a structural failure.Still, Drury insists his job is safe and that “it starts with me.” But if it truly started with him, he wouldn’t be dodging questions about ownership’s confidence. He wouldn’t be pushing the narrative that a new coach, whether it’s a recycled NHL name or an unproven college upstart, is the magic fix.Also Read: Penguins duo Sidney Crosby and Evgeni Malkin set rivalry aside, celebrate Alex Ovechkin’s historic goal record with Rolex gift And where does this leave the locker room? A rotating door of coaches, a confused roster, and now a fanbase expected to trust that the next hire will right the ship. The truth is, the Rangers' problems won’t be solved with a new face behind the bench. Until the front office owns up to its missteps, New York is chasing shadows.The Rangers didn’t just fire Laviolette. They lit the fuse on a bigger crisis.
Article Summary: New york rangers fire head coach peter laviolette after collapse. Gm chris drury seems content pinning it all on the coaching staff. The rangers' problems won't be solved with a new face behind the bench. Until the front office owns up to its missteps, new york is chasing shadows.

Article Title: 'Veteran cricketer asked to sleep with me': Anaya Bangar, Sanjay Bangar's child, makes bold confession
Article Text:
Anaya Bangar (Image credit: Instagram)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Poll What do you think is more important for a healthy sports environment? Supporting inclusivity and diversity within teams Creating a safe and respectful environment for all players

Bombay Sport Exchange Episode 3: Kane Williamson exclusive on NextGen cricketers to watch out for

NEW DELHI: Anaya Bangar , daughter of former India cricketer and coach Sanjay Bangar , has spoken out about the toxic masculinity that continues to plague the cricketing world. In a candid interview, Anaya revealed disturbing experiences she has faced within the cricketing circle, including receiving nude photos from cricketers, verbal abuse, and being propositioned by a former player.Anaya, who publicly came out last year and shared her journey of transformation through hormone replacement therapy and gender-affirming surgery , was formerly known as Aryan. She followed in her father’s footsteps, playing age-group cricket in India. However, she said the journey after transitioning came with many challenges.“There has been support and there have been some harassment as well,” Anaya said during an interview with Lallantop, reflecting on her journey.When asked how fellow cricketers responded after her gender-affirming surgery, Anaya said: “There have been a few cricketers who randomly sent me nude pictures of them.”She also shared more distressing experiences:“The person used to give gaalis in front of everybody. The same person then used to come and sit beside me and ask for my photos. There was another instance, when I was in India, I told a puraane (veteran) cricketer about my situation. He told me let’s go in the car, I want to sleep with you.”Having played alongside prominent Indian cricketers like Musheer Khan, Sarfaraz Khan, and Yashasvi Jaiswal during her early years, Anaya said she was forced to keep her identity hidden because of her father’s public profile.“I had to maintain secrecy about myself because dad is a well known figure. Cricket world is filled with insecurity and toxic masculinity,” she added.Anaya has represented Islam Gymkhana in Mumbai’s club circuit and also played for Hinckley Cricket Club in Leicestershire, UK.However, her cricketing ambitions faced a major setback in November 2023, when the International Cricket Council (ICC) introduced a new policy barring transgender women from participating in international women’s cricket.“Inclusivity is incredibly important to us as a sport, but our priority was to protect the integrity of the international women’s game and the safety of players,” then-ICC CEO Geoff Allardice had said.Anaya responded to the policy with a detailed post on Instagram, expressing her disappointment with the decision.She currently resides in the United Kingdom.
Article Summary: Anaya bangar is the daughter of former india cricketer and coach sanjay bangar. She publicly came out last year and shared her journey of transformation. Anaya has represented islam gymkhana in mumbai’s club circuit and also played for hinckley cricket club in leicestershire.

It also serves as the home turf for the Las Vegas Raiders in the NFL.With The Show of Shows set to present another blockbuster edition of WrestleMania in Las Vegas, the two night grand spectacle is set to conquer Sin City with an experience of a lifetime for wrestling fans worldwide.Also Read: “It’ll be the 20th time” – Randy Orton refuses to sit out at WrestleMania 41 on WWE SmackDown

The show will feature multiple marquee matches for both nights of the show and is expected to be a blockbuster hit. Article Title: 'Woke up to watch an 8th grader': Google CEO Sundar Pichai left awestruck by 14-year-old IPL debutant
Article Text:
Rajasthan Royals' Vaibhav Suryavanshi plays a shot during the Indian Premier League cricket match between Lucknow Super Giants and Rajasthan Royals at Sawai Mansingh Stadium in Jaipur, India, Saturday, April 19, 2025. (AP Photo/Surjeet Yadav)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Poll Do you think the Rajasthan Royals should have won the match despite Suryavanshi's performance? No, Lucknow played better. Yes, they were close!

Bombay Sport Exchange Episode 3: Kane Williamson exclusive on NextGen cricketers to watch out for

Google CEO Sundar Pichai was among the many who were left awestruck by 14-year-old batting prodigy Vaibhav Suryavanshi .On Saturday evening, at just 14 years and 23 days old, Vaibhav Suryavanshi etched his name in history as the youngest cricketer to play in the IPL. The Rajasthan Royals management handed Suryavanshi his debut after their regular captain, Sanju Samson, was sidelined due to a thumb injury.Also visit: IPL Live Score Hailing from the Samastipur district of Bihar, the left-handed batsman sent a wave of excitement through the Sawai Mansingh Stadium crowd when he powerfully struck the very first ball he faced for a massive six.By hitting a six on his first delivery, Suryavanshi joined an exclusive club that includes players like Rob Quiney (RR), Kevon Cooper (RR), Andre Russell (KKR), Carlos Brathwaite (DD, now Delhi Capitals), Aniket Choudhary (RCB), Javon Searles (KKR), Siddesh Lad (MI), Mahesh Theekshana (CSK), and Sameer Rizvi (CSK).Suryavanshi played a quick and impactful innings, scoring 34 runs off just 20 balls. He also formed a strong 85-run opening partnership with Yashasvi Jaiswal against the Lucknow Super Giants .His impressive batting even caught the attention of Google CEO Sundar Pichai, who expressed his amazement on X, writing: "Woke up to watch an 8th grader play in the IPL!!!! What a debut!"Suryavanshi had already made headlines in the IPL 2025 auction when, at the age of 13, he became the youngest player to secure an IPL contract, with the Royals acquiring his services for Rs 1.1 crore.He has also represented India Under-19, notably scoring a rapid 58-ball century in a four-day game against Australia U-19.Despite Suryavanshi's remarkable debut, the Rajasthan Royals narrowly lost the match by 2 runs.Aiden Markram and Ayush Badoni scored half-centuries and contributed a crucial 76-run partnership for the fourth wicket, helping Lucknow Super Giants reach a total of 180 for 5.In their reply, Jaiswal (74), Riyan Parag (39), and the young Vaibhav (34) put Rajasthan Royals in a promising position. However, Avesh Khan's impressive bowling performance, taking 3 wickets for 37 runs, including the crucial wickets of Jaiswal, Parag, and Shimron Hetmyer, restricted the home team to 178 for 5.Rajasthan Royals will next face Royal Challengers Bengaluru on April 24 at the M Chinnaswamy Stadium.
Article Summary: Vaibhav suryavanshi is the youngest cricketer to play in the indian premier league. The 14-year-old made his debut for rajasthan royals against lucknow super giants. He hit a six on his first delivery and scored 34 runs off just 20 balls.

Article Title: Sanjiv Goenka memes break the internet after LSG's Rs 27 crore buy Rishabh Pant falls cheaply again
Article Text:
Sanjiv Goenka memes break the internet (Screengrab)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Bombay Sport Exchange Episode 3: Kane Williamson exclusive on NextGen cricketers to watch out for

NEW DELHI: Rishabh Pant 's return to competitive cricket in IPL 2025 was expected to be a triumphant chapter in his comeback story, but things haven’t quite clicked for the Lucknow Super Giants ( LSG ) skipper.On Saturday evening, his struggles continued as he managed just 3 runs off 9 balls before falling to Wanindu Hasaranga in an awkward dismissal against Rajasthan Royals Trying to reverse-sweep a googly that bounced more than expected, Pant only managed a top-edge.Wicketkeeper Dhruv Jurel pulled off a juggling act behind the stumps, grabbing the ball after bobbling it multiple times to send Pant back.The LSG captain didn’t even wait for the umpire's signal, walking off visibly dejected.It was a moment that summed up his campaign so far -- full of intent but lacking execution.LSG co-owner Sanjiv Goenka 's reaction to the dismissal has since gone viral across social media platforms, sparking a meme fest in the process.So far in IPL 2025, Pant has failed to find impactful scores consistently with the bat.His numbers paint a worrying picture: scores of 0, 15, 2, 2, 21, 63, and now 3 across seven innings.Barring a decent outing against Chennai Super Kings, he has looked out of rhythm and short of confidence.While his wicketkeeping has been steady, snagging a few catches in the process, it’s his batting that has come under increasing scrutiny.Pant’s inability to convert starts or anchor innings is beginning to hurt Lucknow's playoff hopes.Once known for his fearless shot-making and match-winning flair, Pant now looks like a player still finding his footing in franchise cricket this season.With the tournament entering a crucial phase, both fans and the LSG think tank will hope their captain can rediscover his form before it’s too late.
Article Summary: Lucknow super giants skipper rishabh pant fails to find form in ipl 2025. Pant managed just 3 runs off 9 balls against rajasthan royals on saturday. Lsg co-owner sanjiv goenka's reaction to pant's dismissal has gone viral.

Article Title: Yuzvendra Chahal and RJ Mahvash fuel dating speculation with airport sighting
Article Text:
RJ Mahavash (left) was spotted with Punjab Kings cricketer Yuzvendra Chahal.

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Poll Do you think RJ Mahvash and Yuzvendra Chahal are dating? No, just friends. Yes, definitely!

From golden duck to 39-ball ton! Priyansh Arya follows Ricky Ponting's first-ball six advice

Social media star RJ Mahvash , who raised eyebrows among netizens after her appearance with cricketer Yuzvendra Chahal at the Champions Trophy Final , has further fuelled dating rumours with her regular presence at Punjab Kings ' matches in this year's Indian Premier League (IPL).RJ Mahvash was recently seen with Chahal before the match between Royal Challengers Bengaluru and Punjab Kings at the Chandigarh airport.A video of them boarding the team bus with other Punjab Kings teammates has gone viral.Exiting the Chandigarh airport alongside other team members, the rumoured couple, Yuzvendra and Mahvash, were captured in a video shared on Instagram, appearing happy as they headed towards the team bus.Yuzvendra Chahal's personal life has been under scrutiny following his recent separation from influencer and choreographer Dhanashree, whom he married in 2020 and officially announced their split on March 20, 2025.Amidst this, dating rumours involving Chahal and Mahvash have been circulating online for several months. Mahvash has frequently been seen supporting Chahal's team, the Punjab Kings, during the IPL 2025 season. Following a notable performance by Chahal in Mohali, Mahvash publicly praised him with a selfie, referring to him as "a talented man."Adding fuel to the speculation, Mahvash attended a Punjab Kings match in Chandigarh last week and shared numerous pictures from the stadium. One image captured her enthusiastic cheering, while another was a selfie alongside Yuzvendra Chahal, further intensifying the dating buzz. She accompanied the selfie with a supportive message, to which Chahal responded warmly, calling them his "spine."After a slow start to the tournament, Chahal has registered two back-to-back match-winning performances for the Punjab Kings. The 34-year-old has picked up 8 wickets in seven matches so far.After dismantling Royal Challengers Bengaluru at their home turf on Friday, a high-flying Punjab Kings unit will look to complete a season double when the two teams clash again in Match 37 of IPL 2025 on Sunday in New Chandigarh.
Article Summary: Rj mahvash was spotted with punjab kings cricketer yuzvendra chahal. The pair were seen boarding the team bus at the chandigarh airport. Dating rumours involving the pair have been circulating online for months.

Article Title: WWE WrestleMania 41 results: Seth Rollins wins the triple threat match by the help of Paul Heyman
Article Text:
Image via WWE

Seth Rollins wins the triple threat match at WrestleMania 41



Finally, the moment everyone had been waiting for arrived—the main event of the night: a colossal Triple Threat match featuring Seth Rollins Roman Reigns , and CM Punk .All three superstars made electrifying entrances, but it was CM Punk’s that truly stole the spotlight. Walking in alongside Paul Heyman, Punk's entrance marked the first time in years that Roman Reigns entered a match alone—without his "Wiseman" by his side.As the bell rang, Punk immediately rolled out of the ring, mocking Reigns by chatting with Heyman about both Roman and Seth. This made Roman furious, while Seth couldn’t help but laugh at the situation. Without wasting a second, Reigns lashed out and struck Rollins.Roman began asserting dominance, unleashing a number of strikes on both Punk and Rollins. But Rollins quickly recovered, launching a suicide dive onto Reigns at ringside and throwing him into the steel steps.The action spilled into the crowd, with Punk and Rollins brawling fiercely. Both superstars took full advantage of the No Disqualification stipulation, battling with steel chairs and trash cans. Punk even slammed Rollins onto a trash can, sending the audience into a frenzy.Just when it seemed like chaos couldn’t get any crazier, Roman Reigns leaped into the crowd, taking down both Rollins and Punk before clearing off the announce table to continue his assault.Back inside the ring, Reigns continued to dominate until Punk reversed a Superman Punch attempt. The momentum shifted in Punk’s favor as he began landing heavy shots on both opponents, even hitting simultaneous DDTs on Reigns and Rollins. Reigns charged in for a Spear, but Punk reversed it into a GTS—only for Reigns to counter, and the two exchanged a brutal series of strikes.Punk then locked Reigns in the Anaconda Vise, but Rollins broke it up with a top-rope splash. Rollins followed up with back-to-back Buckle Bombs on both Punk and Reigns.As the match reached its climax, Rollins lifted Punk for a Pedigree, but Reigns speared Punk mid-move. Reigns then tried to spear Rollins, but Rollins countered mid-air into a Pedigree of his own!Just when Punk was about to deliver a GTS to Rollins, Reigns hit Rollins with a spear—only for Punk to immediately hit Reigns with the GTS. Shockingly, Roman kicked out at two.In a surprising twist, Rollins attempted to convince Reigns to work together and take out Punk. He even suggested performing the classic Shield triple powerbomb, but Reigns turned on Rollins and powerbombed Punk through the announce table himself.And then, everything changed.In one of the most shocking moments in WWE history, Paul Heyman did the unthinkable. He slid a steel chair into the ring, seemingly helping Punk. But just as Punk prepared to strike Reigns, Heyman delivered a low blow to Punk!Heyman then handed the chair to Reigns, appearing to realign himself with the Tribal Chief. But in another jaw-dropping twist, just as Reigns went to attack Rollins, Heyman low-blowed Reigns too!Capitalizing on the moment, Rollins grabbed the steel chair, blasted Reigns with it, and followed up with a devastating Curb Stomp. Rollins pinned Reigns and walked away with the victory in one of the most unpredictable, chaotic, and unforgettable main events in sports entertainment history.
Article Summary: Seth rollins defeated cm punk and roman reigns in a triple threat match at wrestlemania 41. The match was the first time in years that reigns entered a match alone without his "wiseman" by his side. In a shocking twist, paul heyman low-blowed reigns as he prepared to strike rollins.

Article Title: Vaibhav Suryavanshi makes history as youngest IPL debutant at age 14
Article Text:
Vaibhav Suryavanshi has been named as an Impact Sub by Rajasthan Royals against Lucknow Super Giants in IPL 2025. He is the youngest debutant in the league's history.

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

IPL Auction: Rajasthan Royals make Vaibhav Suryavanshi youngest IPL crorepati

Fourteen-year-old Vaibhav Suryavanshi became the youngest player to make his Indian Premier League debut as he replaced injured captain Sanju Samson in Rajasthan Royals ' match against Lucknow Super Giants on Saturday evening.Born in 2011, Suryavanshi achieved a unique milestone by becoming the first IPL player who was born after the tournament's inception in 2008.The young debutant stepped in for Rajasthan Royals captain Sanju Samson, who was sidelined due to a side injury for the match against LSG.This historic debut marks a significant moment in IPL history , with Suryavanshi breaking the record for the youngest player to feature in the tournament since its beginning in 2008.At the toss, RR stand-in captain Riyan Parag mentioned Suryavanshi has been added to the Impact Substitutes bench with an indication of involvement at some point."We were looking to bowl, it is a little bit warm under lights, should be better than the last time. Vaibhav the youngster comes in," said Parag at the toss where LSG decided to bat."It's been kinda tricky, we've been doing small bits right but we haven't been able to put a collective performance together, we've been having honest chats as a team. We love playing here, we know the conditions well, hope we can put that to good use," he added.Suryavanshi had made history last year as well when the Bihar youngster was picked at the mega auction for Rs 1.1 crore. At 13 years old, he had become the youngest to bag an IPL deal.Suryavanshi has a triple-century to his name - an unbeaten 332 - in the Randhir Verma Tournament, an U-19 competition in Bihar.He's played five first-class matches and scored 100 runs at an average of 10.00 at a strike rate of 63.29.
Article Summary: Fourteen-year-old vaibhav suryavanshi becomes the youngest player to make his indian premier league debut. He replaced injured captain sanju samson in rajasthan royals'match against lucknow super giants on saturday evening. At 13, he had become the youngest to bag an ipl deal.

Article Title: NYT Strands today: Clues, answers, Spangram for April 18, 2025
Article Text:
NYT Strands April 18, 2025 – Hints, answers, Spangram



Today's NYT Strands puzzle theme

The theme for today’s Strands is 'On the board'

Hints for today’s Strands



Hints

Hint #1: a classic two-player strategy puzzle where players try to guess and destroy their opponent’s boats.

a classic two-player strategy puzzle where players try to guess and destroy their opponent’s boats. Hint #2: the most basic element in “Mahjong”.

NYT Strands April 18, 2025 – Hints, answers, Spangram



Spangram for today



GamePieces

Today's Strands’ answers:



DOMINO

CHECKER

KNIGHT

TILE

BATTLESHIP

TOKEN

What are NYT Strands and how to play the game?



Tips for solving NYT Strands puzzle



The New York Times published its inaugural crossword puzzle on February 15, 1942, in the Sunday Magazine. Created by Charles Erlenkotter and edited by Margaret Farrar, it was the first major newspaper to feature a crossword puzzle. Over the years, the NYT has introduced several beloved games, including the Mini Crossword in 2014, followed by Spelling Bee, Letter Boxed, and Tiles. In 2022, the NYT launched the wildly popular Wordle, followed by additional games like Connections and Strands.NYT Strands is the latest addition to its puzzle offerings. This engaging daily game presents players with new themes each day, challenging them to uncover all the words on the grid. One of the game’s highlights is the special Spangram, which stretches across two sides of the board. With its innovative approach to word puzzles, Strands quickly became a fan favorite, adding to the diverse and exciting puzzle lineup of the New York Times.Having trouble solving today’s NYT Strands puzzle? We’re here to help with some easy hints to fuel your curiosity even more. Plus, we’ve got today’s answer waiting for you – just keep reading.Below, we’ve shared the hints, answers, and Spangram for today’s NYT Strands puzzle. The hints may give away part or all of the Strands, so proceed with caution. Scroll down to continue:is the Spangram for today’s NYT Strands puzzle.Strands is a puzzle game that blends elements of Connections, Spelling Bee, and classic crossword puzzles. Players are given 48 letters arranged on a 6 x 8-inch grid, along with a daily theme. The goal is to solve the Spangram and uncover all the theme-related words.To play, connect letters on the grid to form words by dragging your mouse or fingers (on a touchscreen) in horizontal, vertical, or diagonal directions.Start by identifying the central theme word or Spangram, which will help you understand the puzzle’s theme.In addition to the Spangram, you must also find other words related to the theme hidden in the grid. Once you’ve uncovered them all, the puzzle is complete.Identify the theme words: Fill in the grid with the theme words. Once found, they will be highlighted in blue and won't overlap with each other.Find the Spangram: Identify the Spangram, a key part of the puzzle that connects two opposite sides of the grid. It encapsulates the theme and may consist of two words. The Spangram will be highlighted in yellow once you’ve located it.Take advantage of hints: Pay attention to off-topic words for clues. For every three non-theme words you uncover, letters will be highlighted to give you a hint toward finding a theme word, without directly revealing it.
Article Summary: Strands is a puzzle game that blends elements of connections, spelling bee, and classic crossword puzzles. Players are given 48 letters arranged on a 6 x 8-inch grid, along with a daily theme. The goal is to solve the spangram and uncover all the theme-related words.

Article Title: Koneru Humpy outplays Munguntuul in tactical masterclass at FIDE Women’s Grand Prix
Article Text:
Humpy beats ‘old-time rival’ Munguntuul

updates

Pune: Koneru Humpy and Batkhuyag Munguntuul of Mongolia faced off for the first time in 1999 during the World U-12 girls’ championship. Five of the other eight players from the ongoing FIDE Women’s Grand Prix here were not even born at that time.Humpy, 38, used all her experience to take the game to unknown territory and scored a full point against Munguntuul in the sixth round by sacrificing material for the winning advantage on Sunday.With Zhu Jiner avenging her World Blitz meet defeat to R Vaishali , Humpy could not join the Chinese as the joint leader. But with 98% accuracy in the win with black pieces, she won’t be short on confidence. Zhu retained sole leadership on five points followed by Humpy on 4.5 points with three rounds to go.Humpy will play with white pieces against Zhu in a potential decider in the seventh round on Monday. Humpy took her game to the Ulvestad Variation (Two Knights in Italian opening) with a pawn push on the fifth move -- a variation not to be found in the database of both players.Though Munguntuul did not fall for the gambit, her Qf3 --threatening a Mate in 1 –appeared out of her depth; and the subsequent play indicated that she was probably not familiar with the structure. Humpy co-ordinated her pieces and launched a deadly kingside attack against the castled king, punishing the earlier Qf3.She had castled her own king on the opposite side and then moved it to b8 and guarded it against any attack. With pawns marching ahead in ‘e’, ‘f’ and ‘g’ files and double rooks on the ‘h’ file with queen on g6, it looked lost for the Mongolian. Humpy gave away two rooks for the rival queen and activated her knight and bishop.The potent pawns had done the damage by exposing the white king. It was Munguntuul’s sixth decisive and fourth defeat. Zhu Jiner had lost a four-game quarterfinal to Vaishali in the World Blitz in New York in Dec. But the Chinese won a complicated endgame against the Indian on Sunday involving mutual and multiple inaccuracies around the 20th move of the Sicilian Rossolimo.When the dust settled, Zhu was a knight-up in the queen and pawns endgame.
Article Summary: Humpy, 38, used all her experience to take the game to unknown territory. Zhu jiner avenged her world blitz meet defeat to r vaishali. Humpy will play with white pieces against zhu in a potential decider on monday.

Article Title: Arjun loses gold by hair’s breadth; Rudrankksh, Arya win mixed silver
Article Text:
Shooting WC Lima: Arjun Babuta bags silver in men’s air rifle

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW! It was ‘win some, miss some’ for Indian shooters on Saturday night in Lima. While Arjun Babuta won silver, the gold was missed by a mere 0.1 points in the men’s 10m air rifle event at the World Cup in Peru’s capital.On the other hand, in the same final, Buenos Aires gold medallist and former World Champion shooter Rudrankksh Patil crashed from fourth position to last after his rifle misfired due to a malfunction. Later, on Sunday, Rudrankksh Patil kept the disappointment aside and regrouped with Arya Borse to win silver in the 10m air rifle mixed event.The Indian pair lost the gold medal match to Norway’s Jeanette Duestad Hegg and Jon-Hermann Hegg 17-11. Babuta was ahead of the eventual gold medallist Sheng Lihao of China from the 10th shot onwards. The Paris Olympics participant shot high 10s to stay ahead of the Games’ double gold medallist.The Indian maintained the lead till the 22nd shot, but Lihao then shot a 10.9 and 10.3 to surge ahead, while Babuta shot 10.3 and 10.5 to lose by 0.1 point. Babuta scored 252.3, while Lihao took gold with 252.4. The silver went to Istvan Peni of Hungary with 229.8. “I had been struggling in the finals for a long time.I wasn’t keeping the scores throughout the match and was trying to focus only on my shots,” he later told TOI. Babuta added that losing the gold by 0.1 point didn’t matter in the end. “I had been finishing fourth (including Paris) since many finals, so a silver was a good deal. I am not losing my sleep over the missed gold. I think I must cherish the silver and work with more confidence for other tournaments,” he added.Meanwhile, for Patil, his journey ended after the 10th shot, which was fired inadvertently. As he tried to take position, his rifle fired a shot after amalfunction. The jury at the range registered the shot and since the pellet didn’t hit the target, he got zero.At that point, Patil was at fourth position and looked poised to climb up with 10.8 and 10.6 off his last two shots. The misfire gave his 11th shot a zero and the Indian didn’t shoot the 12th shot as it was redundant with him dropping to the eighth position in the eight-man final.
Article Summary: Arjun babuta won silver in the men’s 10m air rifle event at the world cup in peru. Babuta was ahead of the eventual gold medallist sheng lihao of china from the 10th shot onwards. Rudrankksh patil crashed from fourth position to last after his rifle misfired due to a malfunction.

Article Title: Will Colin Kaepernick return in 2025? His girlfriend’s update sparks hope among fans
Article Text:
Colin Kaepernick refuses to quit—his 2025 NFL return hopes get a new update

Colin Kaepernick is still chasing an NFL comeback dream, and 2025 could finally be the year



Colin Kaepernick may have been absent from an NFL roster since the 2016 season, but his passion for football hasn't cooled — not even slightly. The former San Francisco 49ers quarterback, who ignited global conversations through his protest against racial injustice, continues to train rigorously in hopes of reigniting his NFL career. Now 37, Kaepernick’s unwavering determination and athletic discipline show that his desire to return is not rooted in nostalgia — it’s rooted in belief.According to longtime partner Nessa Diab, Colin Kaepernick is still going all in. “He’s training all day, every day,” she told TMZ Sports, before adding, “it’s all up to the teams if they’ll let him [play].” This commitment isn’t for publicity or pity — it’s preparation. Despite the passing years and relentless rejections, Kaepernick hasn't moved on from football. He’s simply waiting for football to move back toward him.Kaepernick’s last official NFL game was played on January 1, 2017, where he threw for 215 yards and a touchdown against the Seattle Seahawks. Since then, teams have stayed silent. While he had a workout with the Las Vegas Raiders in May 2022, it didn’t result in a contract. In 2023, following Aaron Rodgers’ Achilles injury, Kaepernick even reached out to the New York Jets, proposing a spot on their practice squad as a “risk-free contingency plan.”“Worst case scenario, you see what I have to offer and you’re not that impressed,” he wrote in a letter to Jets GM Joe Douglas. “Best case scenario, you realize you have a real weapon at your disposal… I would wear that responsibility like a badge of honor.” Yet again, the call never came.And when Jim Harbaugh — his former 49ers coach — publicly suggested they discussed a possible coaching role with the Chargers in 2024, Kaepernick denied the claim with clarity and humor. “I found out the same way everyone else did — on social media,” he said on The Tonight Show. “No, no coaching offer.”Kaepernick has also addressed the public perception that time has dulled his athletic ability. In a 2023 Sports Illustrated interview, he emphasized, “I looked forward to being judged by talent, not political bias.” He still stands firm in his belief that kneeling during the national anthem for racial justice led to him being blackballed — not his performance.There’s no doubt Kaepernick’s stats back up his case. With 12,271 career passing yards, 72 touchdowns, and just 30 interceptions, he remains one of the more efficient quarterbacks in recent league history. He also led the 49ers to a Super Bowl appearance in 2014 — an achievement not easily forgotten by San Francisco fans. His 69-58 regular-season record speaks to his consistency and competitiveness.But what truly sets Kaepernick apart is that he’s no longer just a quarterback — he’s a symbol. A symbol of resistance, courage, and conviction. Very few athletes have sacrificed as much for a cause they believe in. And even fewer have kept training for nearly a decade without the guarantee of another shot.In a league where injuries are constant and quarterback depth is always tested, it’s not far-fetched to believe that a door could still open. Every offseason and midseason shake-up sparks speculation, and each year, the question quietly resurfaces: Will Colin Kaepernick get the call?His journey is far from over. Whether the ending includes a triumphant return to the field or simply the recognition of a career unfairly interrupted, Kaepernick’s story continues to matter — not just to fans, but to history.Until that call comes, Colin Kaepernick remains prepared — training daily, driven by both talent and purpose. The former san francisco 49ers quarterback continues to train rigorously in hopes of reigniting his nfl career.
